name: Adsgadget
tag_list: marketing, self-serve-ad-platforms, online-advertising, advertising, internet-marketing, digital-marketing
overview:
Adsgadget is a self-serve ad platform created for publishers looking to make revenue from their site traffic.

Adsgadget requires 1$ minimum payment threshold, no minimum impression volume and supports all geographic locations. After signing up, publishers can go live immediately and see the banners on their website. Users are only required to copy and paste the tag on their site, Adsgadget takes care of the rest.

What makes us different?

Simple - Adsgadget designed an interface with the simplest, most user friendly, and easy to use characteristics possible. The goal is to help the publisher as much as possible while giving him complete control over his website content.

Immediate- Publishers need not wait for approval or auditing in order to go live. Tags are ready to be published the second you create them.

Know-How- Our professional team uses high-end optimization algorithms to direct the userâ€™s traffic to the best performing campaigns.

Unbeatable Rates- Our professional optimization team and a wide variety of clients with competitive payouts provide publishers with the best rates in the industry.

24/7 Professional Support- Adsgadget counts with dedicated account managers that are available at all times.

milestones.description: AdsGadget gets acclaim all over the web
